description.@en: There is a willingness to Apostles to spread their faith by all means necessary. Others protest at such unethical approaches, but that’s generally because they’re being berated while suffering the Apostle’s wrath.

effect.@en: Whenever you deal Damage with a weapon, you also inflict an equal amount of mental Peril. This only affects creatures that are classified as a Humanoid or Mutant (including player Ancestries).
